languages.text: "Это — истина. Мы, Эксплораторы, — саперы Познания. Мы идем по неизведанной территории, превращая ее в жизненное пространство, пока не достигаем точки, за которую двигаться нельзя. Наши останки станут сигналом для последователей — дальше пути нет. Теперь их долг — развиваться в отвоеванном нами пространстве и искать способы прорваться дальше. Неудача не должна останавливать нас, ибо неудача — приемлемый результат".

"This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."
languages.original_text: "Это — истина. Мы, Эксплораторы, — саперы Познания. Мы идем по неизведанной территории, превращая ее в жизненное пространство, пока не достигаем точки, за которую двигаться нельзя. Наши останки станут сигналом для последователей — дальше пути нет. Теперь их долг — развиваться в отвоеванном нами пространстве и искать способы прорваться дальше. Неудача не должна останавливать нас, ибо неудача — приемлемый результат".

We walk an uncharted terrain, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。我们开拓者就是行走在知识的未知地带的探路者，负责把它变成可居住的空间，直到抵达无法继续前进的极限为止。到了那个时候，我们的遗体便会成为留给追随者的警告：‘此处禁止前进’。届时，他们的职责便是在我们开拓的空间内发展壮大，寻找方法取得进一步的突破。我们绝不能因为失败而停下脚步，因为失败是可以接受的结果。”
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。我们开拓者就是行走在知识的未知地带的探路者，负责把它变成可居住的空间，直到抵达无法继续前进的极限为止。到了那个时候，我们的遗体便会成为留给追随者的警告：‘此处禁止前进’。届时，他们的职责便是在我们开拓的空间内发展壮大，寻找方法取得进一步的突破。我们绝不能因为失败而停下脚步，因为失败是可以接受的结果。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Eso es cierto. Los exploradores somos los zapadores que recorremos los terrenos desconocidos del conocimiento, convirtiéndolos en espacio habitable hasta llegar a un punto a partir del cual no se debe avanzar. Nuestros restos sirven de señal a quienes siguen nuestros pasos: "ni un paso más". Su deber pasa a ser desarrollar el espacio que hemos conquistado y buscar formas de realizar nuevos avances. El fracaso no debe detenernos, puesto que es un resultado aceptable».
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es cierto. Los exploradores somos los zapadores que recorremos los terrenos desconocidos del conocimiento, convirtiéndolos en espacio habitable hasta llegar a un punto a partir del cual no se debe avanzar. Nuestros restos sirven de señal a quienes siguen nuestros pasos: "ni un paso más". Su deber pasa a ser desarrollar el espacio que hemos conquistado y buscar formas de realizar nuevos avances. El fracaso no debe detenernos, puesto que es un resultado aceptable».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「これは真実だ。我ら探索艦隊は、知識という未開の地を歩き、居住可能な空間に変えていく工兵なのだ。私たちの残骸は、私たちの足跡をたどる者たちへの印となる。『それ以上進むなかれ』と。彼らの今の義務は、さらなる飛躍を遂げる方法を探しながら、私たちが手に入れた空間を用いて発展を進めることだ。失敗は決して我らを止めることはない。失敗は受け入れられる結果なのだから」
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: 「これは真実だ。我ら探索艦隊は、知識という未開の地を歩き、居住可能な空間に変えていく工兵なのだ。私たちの残骸は、私たちの足跡をたどる者たちへの印となる。『それ以上進むなかれ』と。彼らの今の義務は、さらなる飛躍を遂げる方法を探しながら、私たちが手に入れた空間を用いて発展を進めることだ。失敗は決して我らを止めることはない。失敗は受け入れられる結果なのだから」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist wahr. Wir Exploratoren sind die Pioniere, die das noch nicht kartografierte Terrain des Wissens durchwandern und in bewohnbares Gebiet verwandeln, bis wir an einen Punkt kommen, über den wir nicht hinausgehen dürfen. Unsere Überreste dienen als Zeichen für jene, die in unsere Fußstapfen treten: 'Geht nicht weiter.' Ihre Pflicht ist es nun, das von uns eroberte Gebiet zu entwickeln und nach Wegen zu suchen, weitere Durchbrüche zu erzielen. Fehlschläge dürfen uns niemals aufhalten, denn Fehlschläge sind ein akzeptables Ergebnis."
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wahr. Wir Exploratoren sind die Pioniere, die das noch nicht kartografierte Terrain des Wissens durchwandern und in bewohnbares Gebiet verwandeln, bis wir an einen Punkt kommen, über den wir nicht hinausgehen dürfen. Unsere Überreste dienen als Zeichen für jene, die in unsere Fußstapfen treten: 'Geht nicht weiter.' Ihre Pflicht ist es nun, das von uns eroberte Gebiet zu entwickeln und nach Wegen zu suchen, weitere Durchbrüche zu erzielen. Fehlschläge dürfen uns niemals aufhalten, denn Fehlschläge sind ein akzeptables Ergebnis."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est vrai. En tant qu'explorators, nous sommes les sapeurs qui arpentent le terrain inconnu de la Connaissance pour le transformer en espace habitable, jusqu'à atteindre une frontière à ne pas franchir. Nos dépouilles serviront d'avertissement à ceux qui nous suivront : "N'allez pas plus loin". Leur mission est désormais de développer cet espace, tout en cherchant des moyens de faire d'autres avancées. L'échec est un résultat acceptable qui ne doit jamais nous arrêter. »
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. En tant qu'explorators, nous sommes les sapeurs qui arpentent le terrain inconnu de la Connaissance pour le transformer en espace habitable, jusqu'à atteindre une frontière à ne pas franchir. Nos dépouilles serviront d'avertissement à ceux qui nous suivront : "N'allez pas plus loin". Leur mission est désormais de développer cet espace, tout en cherchant des moyens de faire d'autres avancées. L'échec est un résultat acceptable qui ne doit jamais nous arrêter. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

languages.text: "Bu doğru. Biz Keşiftörler, İrfanın keşfedilmemiş diyarında yürüyen lağımcılarız. Orayı yaşanabilir bir yere dönüştürür, ilerisine gitmememiz gereken noktaya ulaşana kadar durmayız. Bıraktıklarımız, adımlarımızı izleyenler için birer işarettir: 'Daha ileri gitme'. Onların vazifesi, artık almış olduğumuz alanı geliştirmek ve daha fazla atılım yapabilmenin yollarını aramaktır. Başarısızlık bizi asla durdurmamalı. Başarısızlık, kabul edilebilir bir sonuçtur."
languages.original_text: "This is true. We Explorators are the sappers who walk the uncharted terrain of Knowledge, transforming it into habitable space, until we reach a point beyond which we must not proceed. Our remains will be a sign to those that follow in our footsteps: 'go no further.' Their duty now is to develop in the space we have claimed, while looking for ways to make further breakthroughs. Failure must never stop us, for failure is an acceptable outcome."

traits.locale_text: "Bu doğru. Biz Keşiftörler, İrfanın keşfedilmemiş diyarında yürüyen istihkâmcılarız. Onu yaşanabilir bir yere dönüştürürüz. Ta ki daha ilerisine gitmememiz gereken noktaya ulaşana dek. Bıraktıklarımız, adımlarımızı izleyenler için birer işaret olacak: 'Daha ileri gitme'. Onların vazifesi artık almış olduğumuz alanı geliştirmek ve daha fazla atılım yapabilmek için yollar aramaktır. Başarısızlık bizi asla durdurmamalı. Başarısızlık kabul edilebilir bir sonuçtur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
